Printing the program help menu:
usage: pytoxo [-h] (--max_prev | --max_her) MODEL MAF PREV_OR_HER

PyToxo: A Python library for calculating penetrance tables of any bivariate
epistasis model.

positional arguments:
  MODEL        The path to the epistatic model CSV file.
  MAF          The MAF to use.
  PREV_OR_HER  The heritability or prevalence to use, depending of the used
               flag.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help   show this help message and exit
  --max_prev   This flag set PyToxo to maximize the prevalence, so the
               'PREV_OR_HER' argument will be considered as heritability.
  --max_her    This flag set PyToxo to maximize the prevalence, so the
               'PREV_OR_HER' argument will be considered as prevalence.

Copyright 2021 Borja GonzÃ¡lez Seoane.

Example 1: 'pytoxo models/additive_3.csv 0.4 0.4 --max_her':
AABBCC,0.198798725268582
AABBCc,0.260222390864220

Example 2, saving the table to a temporary file: 'pytoxo models/additive_2.csv --max_her 0.3 0.1 > "$tmp_file"':
